com.paypal.android.sdk.payments

Class PayPalPaymentDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPaymentDetails

  • public final class PayPalPaymentDetails
extends Object
    Optionally describes additional amount details for a PayPalPayment.

    This object specifies the the breakdown of a payment amount, including item subtotal, shipping, and tax.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PayPalPaymentDetails

        public PayPalPaymentDetails(BigDecimal shipping,
                    BigDecimal subtotal,
                    BigDecimal tax)
        PayPalPaymentDetails defines optional amount details. When payment details are defined,
        the sum of shipping, subtotal, and tax must add up to the specified payment amount.
        See documentation for more details.

        Parameters:
        subtotal - Sub-total (amount) of items being paid for. 10 characters max with support for 2 decimal places. REQUIRED.
        shipping - Amount charged for shipping. 10 characters max with support for 2 decimal places.
        tax - Amount charged for tax. 10 characters max with support for 2 decimal places.

    • Method Detail

        public boolean isProcessable()
        To be processable, the subtotal field must be populated.
